db:article.db:para: The Big5 codecs (QBig5Codec, QBig5hkscsCodec) provide conversion to and from the Big5 encodings.
Used in Qt Core if ICU is not used. Configure with -icu to avoid.
The sources can be found in qt5compat/src/core5/codecs/qbig5codec.cpp.
